parse.title: List of inventions named after people

text.*:
The topic of this article may not meet Wikipedia's notability guideline for stand-alone lists. Please help to establish notability by citing reliable secondary sources that are independent of the topic and provide significant coverage of it beyond a mere trivial mention. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be merged, redirected, or deleted.
Find sources: "List of inventions named after people" – news · newspapers · books · scholar · JSTOR (May 2012) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

This is a list of inventions followed by name of the inventor (or whomever else it is named after). For other lists of eponyms (names derived from people) see Lists of etymologies.

Contents

  • 1 The list
    • 1.1 A to F
    • 1.2 G to M
    • 1.3 N to S
    • 1.4 T to Z
  • 2 See also
  • 3 References

The list[edit]

A to F[edit]

Bailey bridge in Libya
Büchner funnel and flask
A round, white Botts' dot
A Codd bottle
Crompton's mule
Dr. Martens boots
An Éolienne Bollée
London Eye Ferris wheel
